reviewText: Hadn't seen this concert before. Apparently the intention was to release, at the time it was made, a high quality, professional concert film. While the extant material doesn't come up to the standard of a highly polished output, the chance to view the Experience with Hendrix, Mitchell and Redding in full control of their powerful visual and musical talents is more than worth the price of admission. Spoiler: as the performance unfolds, watch how the staid audience loosens up!
Awesome performance by Hendrix, this rare oop is worth it for the hardcore Jimi fans
